environment_variables.FLUXIONPath: path to directory containing the FLUXION executable script
environment_variables.FLUXIONLibPath: path to directory containing the FLUXION library (scripts)
environment_variables.FLUXIONWorkspacePath: path to the temp. directory available to FLUXION & subscripts
environment_variables.FLUXIONIPTablesBackup: path to FLUXION's iptables backup file
environment_variables.FLUXIONAirmonNG: flag to indicate airmon-ng is used
environment_variables.FLUXIONHoldXterm: flag to hold xterm window open
environment_variables.SandboxWorkspacePath: path to the temp. directory available to FLUXION & subscripts
environment_variables.InstallerUtilsWorkspacePath: path to the temp. directory available to FLUXION & subscripts
environment_variables.PackageManagerLog: log file for the package manager
environment_variables.FluxionTargetMAC: MAC address of the target access point
environment_variables.FluxionTargetSSID: SSID of the target access point
environment_variables.FluxionTargetChannel: channel of the target access point
environment_variables.FluxionTargetSSIDClean: sanitized SSID of the target access point
environment_variables.FluxionTargetRogueMAC: MAC address of the rogue access point
environment_variables.FluxionTargetTrackerDaemonPID: process ID of the target tracker daemon
environment_variables.FluxionDone: last executed instruction in a sequence
environment_variables.InterfacePhysical: physical state of the selected interface
environment_variables.TOPLEFTBIG: geometry for big top left window
environment_variables.TOPRIGHTBIG: geometry for big top right window
environment_variables.capturePath: path to the capture file for target tracker
environment_variables.attackWasSet: flag to indicate if an attack was selected
environment_variables.candidateAPInfo: information about a candidate access point
environment_variables.candidatesMAC: array of MAC addresses of candidate access points
environment_variables.candidatesClientsCount: array of number of clients connected to candidate access points
environment_variables.candidatesChannel: array of channels of candidate access points
environment_variables.candidatesSecurity: array of security types of candidate access points
environment_variables.candidatesSignal: array of signal strengths of candidate access points
environment_variables.candidatesPower: array of power levels of candidate access points
environment_variables.candidatesESSID: array of ESSIDs of candidate access points
environment_variables.candidatesColor: array of colors for candidate access points
environment_variables.candidatesQuality: array of quality values of candidate access points
environment_variables.power: power level of a candidate access point
environment_variables.sanitizedESSID: sanitized ESSID of a candidate access point
environment_variables.FluxionTargetEncryption: encryption type of the target access point
environment_variables.FluxionTargetMakerID: maker ID of the target access point
environment_variables.FluxionTargetMaker: maker of the target access point
environment_variables.rogueMACHex: hexadecimal value for the rogue MAC address
environment_variables.targetInfo: information about the target access point
environment_variables.targetChannel: channel of the target access point
environment_variables.interfaceQueryTip2: second tip for selecting an interface
environment_variables.interfacesAvailableInfo: array of information about available interfaces
environment_variables.interfacesAvailableColor: array of colors for available interfaces
environment_variables.interfacesAvailableState: array of states of available interfaces
environment_variables.allocatingWirelessInterface: flag to indicate if allocating a wireless interface
environment_variables.__fluxion_do_sequence__index: associative array of do instruction indices
environment_variables.__fluxion_do_sequence__instructionIndex: index of the current do instruction
